DOC.brief_summary: This randomized phase III trial study surgery axillary lymph node dissection evaluate systematic axillary node clearance avoid locoregional treatment operable breast cancer small 10 mm among menopausal woman older 50
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Breast Resection With Without Axillary Lymph Node Excision Treating Women With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Women , 50 year Menopausal woman Breast cancer Macroscopic tumor size 10 mm less ( measured operation ) No palpable axillary node ( N0 ) Exclusion criterion : Previous cancer history life expectancy < 10 year Metastasis
